name: Earch
text: Hey, name's 'let's sEarch what's wrong with that one', but you can call me Earch

name: Earch
text: I'm the [color=red]Angel of Love[/color]'s little fairy, sent to guide you through

name: Chris
text: Yeah, right, that makes perfect sense

name: Earch
text: Let's get going then ! From what I can see here, we've got a lotta work to do
